text: Fifth seed Pierre-Hugues Herbert won the title, beating Marsel İlhan in the final 6-2, 6-3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Internationaux de Tennis de Vendee Category:Internationaux de Tennis de Vendée
